issue.title: [R] Implement lubridate is.* methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14227](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14227). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Lubridate [has a number of `is.*` helpers](https://lubridate.tidyverse.org/reference/index.html#section-date-time-helpers) that we should wrap for detecting time-like things

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14227?focusedCommentId=17439463) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11592
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11592>
